document_data.name: ''Tragic Heroism''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Tragic heroism''''' was a type of [[potion]] uniquely sold at [[Holly's Mill]] in [[Ravens Bluff]].
document_data.Powers: The primary effects of ''tragic heroism'' were similar to the ''[[potion of super heroism]]''. In addition, upon quaffing the potion any creature within {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} of the drinker would stop what they were doing and fight them until either were killed.{{Cite polyhedron/65/Oceans of Potions|19}}
